purge.usage: purge <amount of messages to remove>. Keep in mind this happens instantly.

help.desc: Shows this list or displays command usage.

ping.desc: Call this for an amazing response.

quote.desc: Quotes a recent message from the mentioned user.

restart.desc: Restarts the bot. Useful in case of issues.

anonmsg.desc: I will DM the mentioned user anonymously with your message.

audio.desc: Joins voice and plays an MP3 File specified.

shortcut.desc: Create custom server-specific shortcuts / mini commands / aliases.

q.desc: Streams audio from YouTube. Accepts either links or search queries.

volume.desc: Change the volume for the active queue.

request.desc: A quicker version of queue. Immediately adds songs to current queue without a search options dialogue.

playlist.desc: Queue, add and manage saved playlists. Use the command for more info.
playlist.usage:
playlist <q / add / remove> <id / link / id>
If you're confused, launch the command. Options are also available there.

setsurprise.desc: Joins the voice channel every now and then to play some dank sounds.

skip.desc: skips the currently playing song. (Only for active queue)

attitude.desc: Pesters you about using other bots.

clean.desc: Cleans the chat of commands and other gunk.

imgur.desc: Search imgur or leave empty to return a completely random image.
